FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.
Nato dalle forze vulcaniche primordiali, prospera grazie al terrore assoluto che suscita.
Sie wird von vulkanischen Kräften geboren und lebt von der absoluten Panik, die sie in anderen erweckt.
Né des forces volcaniques, il se nourrit de la panique absolue qu'il inspire.
Nacido de fuerzas volcánicas, saborea el pánico absoluto que genera.
それは火山の力から生まれ、それがもたらす圧倒的な恐慌で育つ。
Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.
Порождение вулканических сил, он процветает за счет вселяемой им стихийной паники.
Nascido de forças vulcânicas, sua força vem do pânico absoluto que gera.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Mentre il Nyxathid entra in gioco, scegli un avversario.
Sowie die Nyxatide ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Gegner.
Au moment où le Nyxathide arrive en jeu, choisissez un adversaire.
En cuanto el Nyxathid entre en juego, elige un oponente.
ニクサシッドが場に出るに際し、対戦相手を1人選ぶ。
As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
При входе Никсатида в игру выберите оппонента.
Conforme Nixatide entra em jogo, escolha um oponente.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS + FILTER_TYPE_OPPONENTS) filter:SetOwner( EffectController() ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted()
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) local delayDC = EffectDC():Make_Chest(1) delayDC:Set_PlayerPtr(0, player)
MTG():CreateDelayedTrigger(1, delayDC)
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local player = ObjectDC():Get_PlayerPtr(0) if player ~= nil then player:AddBadge(PLAYER_BADGE_ICON_CHOSEN_PLAYER, "PLAYER_CHOSEN_ICON") end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.
Il Nyxathid prende -1/-1 per ogni carta nella mano del giocatore scelto.
Die Nyxatide erhält -1/-1 für jede Karte auf der Hand des bestimmten Spielers.
Le Nyxathide gagne -1/-1 pour chaque carte dans la main du joueur choisi.
El Nyxathid obtiene -1/-1 por cada carta en la mano del jugador elegido.
ニクサシッドは、選ばれたプレイヤーの手札にあるカード１枚につき-１/-１の修整を受ける。
Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.
Никсатид получает -1/-1 за каждую карту в руке выбранного игрока.
Nixatide recebe -1/-1 para cada card na mão do jogador escolhido.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local chosen_opponent = ObjectDC():Get_PlayerPtr(0) if chosen_opponent ~= nil then local total = CountCardsInHand( chosen_opponent ) local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( -total ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( -total ) end
